verses.verse: So all Israel <WH3478> were reckoned by genealogies <WH3187>; and <WH3789>, behold, they are written in the book <WH5612> of the kings <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478>: and Judah <WH3063> was carried away <WH1540> captive to Babylon <WH894> for their transgression <WH4604>.

Now the first <WH7223> inhabitants <WH3427> that dwelt in their possessions <WH272> in their cities <WH5892> were Israel <WH3478>, the priests <WH3548>, the Levites <WH3881>, and the Nethinim <WH5411>.

And in Jerusalem <WH3389> dwelt <WH3427> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, and of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> and Manasseh <WH4519>:

Uthai <WH5793> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>, the son <WH1121> of Omri <WH6018>, the son <WH1121> of Imri <WH566>, the son <WH1121> of Bani <WH1137>, of the children <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> the son <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>.
And of the Shilonites <WH7888>: Asaiah <WH6222> the first-born <WH1060>, and his sons <WH1121>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226>: Jeuel <WH3262>, and their brethren <WH251>, six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>: Sallu <WH5543> the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Hodaviah <WH1938>, the son <WH1121> of Hassenuah <WH5574>,

and Ibneiah <WH2997> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395>, and Elah <WH425> the son <WH1121> of Uzzi <WH5813>, the son <WH1121> of Michri <WH4381>, and Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Shephatiah <WH8203>, the son <WH1121> of Reuel <WH7467>, the son <WH1121> of Ibnijah <WH2998>;

and their brethren <WH251>, according to their generations <WH8435>, nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> and six <WH8337>. All these men <WH582> were heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' houses by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>.
And of the priests <WH3548>: Jedaiah <WH3048>, and Jehoiarib <WH3080>, Jachin <WH3199>,

and Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah <WH2518>, the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>, the son <WH1121> of Meraioth <WH4812>, the son <WH1121> of Ahitub <WH285>, the ruler <WH5057> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>;

and Adaiah <WH5718> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395>, the son <WH1121> of Pashhur <WH6583>, the son <WH1121> of Malchijah <WH4441>, and Maasai <WH4640> the son <WH1121> of Adiel <WH5717>, the son <WH1121> of Jahzerah <WH3170>, the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Meshillemith <WH4921>, the son <WH1121> of Immer <WH564>;

and their brethren <WH251>, heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, a thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and threescore <WH8346>; very able <WH2428> men <WH1368> for the work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.

And of the Levites <WH3881>: Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Hasshub <WH2815>, the son <WH1121> of Azrikam <WH5840>, the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah <WH2811>, of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>;
and Bakbakkar <WH1230>, Heresh <WH2792>, and Galal <WH1559>, and Mattaniah <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Mica <WH4316>, the son <WH1121> of Zichri <WH2147>, the son <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>,

and Obadiah <WH5662> the son <WH1121> of Shemaiah <WH8098>, the son <WH1121> of Galal <WH1559>, the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038>, and Berechiah <WH1296> the son <WH1121> of Asa <WH609>, the son <WH1121> of Elkanah <WH511>, that dwelt <WH3427> in the villages <WH2691> of the Netophathites <WH5200>.
And the porters <WH7778>: Shallum <WH7967>, and Akkub <WH6126>, and Talmon <WH2929>, and Ahiman <WH289>, and their brethren <WH251> (Shallum <WH7967> was the chief <WH7218>),
who hitherto waited in the king <WH4428>'s gate <WH8179> eastward <WH4217>: they were the porters <WH7778> for the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>.

And Shallum <WH7967> the son <WH1121> of Kore <WH6981>, the son <WH1121> of Ebiasaph <WH43>, the son <WH1121> of Korah <WH7141>, and his brethren <WH251>, of his father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, the Korahites <WH7145>, were over the work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656>, keepers <WH8104> of the thresholds <WH5592> of the tent <WH168>: and their fathers <WH1> had been over the camp <WH4264> of Jehovah <WH3068>, keepers <WH8104> of the entry <WH3996>.
And Phinehas <WH6372> the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> was ruler <WH5057> over them in time past <WH6440>, and Jehovah was with him <WH3068>.
450 <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Meshelemiah <WH4920> was porter <WH7778> of the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>.

All these that were chosen <WH1305> to be porters <WH7778> in the thresholds <WH5592> were two hundred <WH3967> and twelve <WH8147>. These were reckoned by genealogy <WH3187> in their villages <WH2691>, whom <WH1992> David <WH1732> and Samuel <WH8050> the seer <WH7200> did ordain <WH3245> in their office of trust <WH530>.
So they and their children <WH1121> had the oversight of the gates <WH8179> of the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>, even the house <WH1004> of the tent <WH168>, by wards <WH4931>.
On the four <WH702> sides <WH7307> were the porters <WH7778>, toward the east <WH4217>, west <WH3220>, north <WH6828>, and south <WH5045>.
And their brethren <WH251>, in their villages <WH2691>, were to come <WH935> in every seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> from time <WH6256> to time to be with them <WH6256>:

for the four <WH702> chief <WH1368> porters <WH7778>, who were Levites <WH3881>, were in an office <WH530> of trust <WH3957>, and were over the chambers and over the treasuries <WH214> in the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.

And they lodged <WH3885> round about <WH5439> the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, because the charge <WH4931> thereof was upon them <WH4668>; and to them pertained the opening thereof morning by morning <WH1242>.
And certain of <WH5921> them had charge of <WH5921> the vessels <WH3627> of <WH5921> service <WH935>; for by count were these brought in and by count were these taken out <WH3318>.

Some of them also were appointed <WH4487> over the furniture <WH3627>, and over all the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, and over the fine flour <WH5560>, and the wine <WH3196>, and the oil <WH8081>, and the frankincense <WH3828>, and the spices <WH1314>.
And some of the sons <WH1121> of the priests <WH3548> prepared <WH7543> the confection <WH4842> of the spices <WH1314>.

And Mattithiah <WH4993>, one of the Levites <WH3881>, who was the first-born <WH1060> of Shallum <WH7967> the Korahite <WH7145>, had the office <WH530> of trust over the things that were baked <WH4639> in pans <WH2281>.
And some of their brethren <WH251>, of the sons <WH1121> of the Kohathites <WH6956>, were over the showbread <WH3899>, to prepare <WH3559> it every sabbath <WH7676>.

And these are the singers <WH7891>, heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' houses of the Levites <WH3881>, who dwelt in the chambers <WH3957> and were free <WH6362> from other service <WH4399>; for they were employed in their work day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>.
These were heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' houses of the Levites <WH3881>, throughout their generations <WH8435>, chief <WH7218> men <WH3427>: these dwelt at Jerusalem <WH3389>.
And in Gibeon <WH1391> there dwelt <WH3427> the father <WH1> of Gibeon <WH1391>, Jeiel <WH3273>, whose wife <WH802>'s name <WH8034> was Maacah <WH4601>:
and his first-born <WH1060> son <WH1121> Abdon <WH5658>, and Zur <WH6698>, and Kish <WH7027>, and Baal <WH1168>, and Ner <WH5369>, and Nadab <WH5070>,
and Gedor <WH1446>, and Ahio <WH283>, and Zechariah <WH2148>, and Mikloth <WH4732>.
And Mikloth <WH4732> begat <WH3205> Shimeam <WH8043>. And they also dwelt <WH3427> with their brethren <WH251> in Jerusalem <WH3389>, over against their brethren <WH251>.

And Ner <WH5369> begat <WH3205> Kish <WH7027>; and Kish <WH7027> begat <WH3205> Saul <WH7586>; and Saul <WH7586> begat <WH3205> Jonathan <WH3083>, and Malchi-shua <WH4444>, and Abinadab <WH41>, and Eshbaal <WH792>.
And the son <WH1121> of Jonathan <WH3083> was Merib-baal <WH4807>; and Merib-baal <WH4810> begat <WH3205> Micah <WH4318>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Micah <WH4318>: Pithon <WH6377>, and Melech <WH4429>, and Tahrea <WH8475>, and Ahaz.
And Ahaz <WH271> begat <WH3205> Jarah <WH3294>; and Jarah <WH3294> begat <WH3205> Alemeth <WH5964>, and Azmaveth <WH5820>, and Zimri <WH2174>; and Zimri <WH2174> begat <WH3205> Moza <WH4162>;
and Moza <WH4162> begat <WH3205> Binea <WH1150>; and Rephaiah <WH7509> his son <WH1121>, Eleasah <WH501> his son <WH1121>, Azel <WH682> his son <WH1121>.

And Azel <WH682> had six <WH8337> sons <WH1121>, whose names <WH8034> are these <WH5840>: Azrikam, Bocheru <WH1074>, and Ishmael <WH3458>, and Sheariah <WH8187>, and Obadiah <WH5662>, and Hanan <WH2605>: these were the sons <WH1121> of Azel <WH682>.
